name: Create a new problem in Freshservice from a new feature in ArcGIS Field Maps
description:
Every time a new feature is created in ArcGIS Field Maps, a new problem will be created in Freshservice.

Note that the template works with a sample Debris map described in [this article.](https://www.esri.com/arcgis-blog/products/field-maps/field-mobility/automate-email-notifications-for-field-updates/)
